reviewText: This is one of those DVDs where you certainly get more for your dollar$$$!  It contains a nice sampling of a variety of styles and combinations from 6 top instructors, each with their own interpretive perspective.  Dondi and Katia's use of the salsa and cha cha inspired moves were fun while some of Ava's were physically challenging.  And I found one of Celeste's combinations to be the perfect fit for a choreography I am working on.  Zahra Zuhair's fluid performance at the end was not only a delight to watch but inspiring as well.
